label.OD_SECURITY_DEPOSIT_TITLE: We need a deposit of $%price% before you can upgrade.
label.OD_SECURITY_DEPOSIT_TITLE_DESCRIPTION: Due to the nature of your account history, we need a security deposit, which will be returned after 1 year. Your deposit will be added to your order.
label.OD_DOWN_PAYMENT_TITLE: Your down payment has decreased to
label.OD_DOWN_PAYMENT_TITLE_DESCRIPTION: Great news, your account history is so good we're lowering to upfront costs. We do have to bump up the monthly costs to $21 a month.

You’ll need to authenticate your credit card before adding your gift card. Your credit card will be charged with any remaining balance.

label.OD_CHECKOUT_GIFT_INVALID_DELIVERY_AND_PA:
In-store pickup is unavailable with a 	
gift card.

label.OD_CHECKOUT_GIFT_CARD_EXCEED_BALANCE: Value can not exceed available balance
label.OD_CHECKOUT_GIFT_CARD_EXCEED_AMOUNT_DUE: Value can not exceed amount due.
label.OD_CHECKOUT_GIFT_CARD_TOTAL_EXCEED_AMOUN: Total amount applied can not exceed amount due.
label.OD_CHECKOUT_PROGRESS_MESSAGE: Please wait as we verify your transaction with your card issuing bank. This should only take a moment.
label.OD_CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_CARD_CVV_TOOLTIP: For your security and protection, we need the card verification number. It's the 3-digit number printed on the back of your Visa, MasterCard or Discover card. For American Express holders, it is the 4-digit number on the front of the card.
label.OD_CHECKOUT_SHIPPING_STATUS_TEXT: Get text updates about your order and shipping status.
label.OD_CHECKOUT_SHIPPING_STATUS_SELECT_NUMBE: Select your mobile number to receive text messages.
label.OD_CHECKOUT_INSTANT_CREDIT_TITLE: How you've applied your instant credit
label.OD_CHECKOUT_INSTANT_CREDIT_SUBTITLE: We'll send you a prepaid box to mail in your trade-in. This is only an estimate until we receive and appraise yout device.
label.OD_CHECKOUT_INSTANT_CREDIT_DISCLAIMER: This is just an estimate until we get your phone and can check it out.
label.OD_CHECKOUT_INSTANT_CREDIT_ACCESSORY_PRO: Instant credit applied to discounted price: -$AMOUNT$
label.OD_CHECKOUT_INSTANT_CREDIT_ACCESSORY_APP: Instant credit applied to retail price: -$AMOUNT$

label.OD_CHECKOUT_CUSTOMER_AGREEMENT_ARIA_LABE: I have read and agree to the Verizon Wireless Customer Agreement and Verizon Privacy Policy, including settlement of dispute by arbitration instead of jury trial, as well as the terms of my plan and any optional services I have agreed to purchase.
